ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The lovely Raven Hex's origin is re-told in much more detail here with this issue. We learn of the "Cup Of Shadows", and the important role it had in shping Raven into the Dark Witch we know and love today! Also the markings on Raven's body are fully explained!
